statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled maintenance';
DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_type = 'Calibration';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE data_id = 100 AND sensor_id = 2;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled maintenance';
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND reading_time < '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
